dict.acceptation: 评估；评价；（应偿付金额的）估定；（为征税对财产所作的）估价；

sent.orig: From the assessment main body, speech quality assessment has two modes: subjective assessment and objective assessment.
sent.trans: 语音质量评价从主体上讲，可分为主观评价和客观评价。

sent.orig: Develop management-assessment model, process narratives and control templates. in management-assessment roll-out and training. Conduct validation test.
sent.trans: 搭建内控自评体系，流程描述和控制模板，协助管理团队进行内控自评体系的推出和培训及其有效的测试。

sent.orig: The information security risk assessment develops for several years, becoming a series assessment criterion and method.
sent.trans: 信息安全风险评估发展多年，形成了一系列的评估标准和方法。

sent.orig: Consulting other desertification assessment standard and considering the opinion of experts, brought forward desertification assessment standard.
sent.trans: 参考其它地区的荒漠化评价标准，并充分考虑专家的意见后，提出了本文的荒漠化评价标准体系。

sent.orig: The integral safety assessment is one of the straightforward, simple and effective assessment methods.
sent.trans: 综合性安全评价是直观、简捷、实用、有效的评价方法之一。
